title: DataFrame Basics
text:
DataFrames
DataFrames are 2D tables in Pandasâ€¦

title: NumPy Introduction
text:
NumPy Introduction
NumPy is the foundation for numerical computing in Python.
import numpy as np

arr = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
print(arr)

title: Matplotlib Introduction
text:
Matplotlib Basics
Simple plots in Matplotlib:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plt.plot([1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6])
plt.show()

title: Pandas Introduction
text:
Pandas Introduction
Pandas is a Python library for handling tabular data.
import pandas as pd

data = {'Name': ['Alice', 'Bob'], 'Age': [25, 30]}
df = pd.DataFrame(data)
print(df)
